Events that occurred on 2 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1951 - Christopher Tolkien and Faith Faulconbridge get married.
1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Peter Alford.
1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 205b.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Frodo and Sam, rescued out of the fire, rest in Ithilien.
